name: rForms
description: A Google Forms-like tool for Reddit

SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for Flask's cookies

REDDIT_BACKEND_REDIRECT_URI.description: A reddit personal use script redirect URI

REDDIT_BACKEND_CLIENT_ID.description: A reddit personal use script client id

REDDIT_BACKEND_CLIENT_SECRET.description: A reddit personal use script client secret

REDDIT_BACKEND_USERNAME.description: A reddit account's username (must be listed as a developer for personal use script)

REDDIT_BACKEND_PASSWORD.description: A reddit account's password (must be listed as a developer for personal use script)

REDDIT_USER_AGENT.description: A User-Agent for reddit. Change the username on this to match the owner of this instance.
